text: Manik Lal Ray (Manik Sir) (born 28 December 1949 – 26 July 2019) was a Bangladeshi politician, teacher and freedom fighter. He was a successful leader of the Bhasan Pani Movement in 8th and 9th decade of 20th century. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Bangladeshi politicians Category:Bangladeshi activists Category:People from Bharatpur
title: Manik Lal Ray
